message.body: wow i like that identy :D i need to make a backup this time :P

i think u have more ideas about the future of this than me, i am just testing out different protocolls and idk what it will be in the end, but for now i wanna connect people who are interested in doing tech, opensource stuff :) lets work together to make something which fits all needs , i dont wanna make FB clone , i wanna create something that makes FB obsolete :P

for some people like u and me its enough to have a text based chat or terminal only os, but othery may wanna have beautiful interfaces for everything u know? :) i just wanna do something fun that makes me learn more about Peer To Peer software/lifes .
just found out, that my page-address is a working Bitcoin Address, where u can send BTC to it. I need to rewrite my page header ;)
ipfs will be used for the content addressing ;)
someone know howto delete messages and users? ;)
Not much happening here, because this is just the Frontpage :) But there is alot going on in the background ;)
well , is there an easy way to find a user or do i need to look into every data.json file? ;)
